Dear All,

in the spirit of the discussion here, I prepared PR#7876 where

  • I introduce a new file with the API for covariant and contravariant (mostly removed from algebra/ordered_monoid_lemmas;
  • change algebra/ordered_monoid_lemmas to better use the new typeclasses;
  • fix whatever small breakage might occur.

I know that all breakages can be fixed, since #7645 does this and more! The point of this PR is to break the other one substantially, while hopefully being more manageable!
